price: Abͻdeε a εwͻ nkwa a εwͻ soro ne deε εwͻ asaase so nyinaa de wͻn anim butu fͻm ma Nyankopͻn anaasε wͻberε wͻn ho ase ma no; Soro abͻfoͻ nso, wͻnnyε ahomasoͻ (wͻ N’ahyԑdeԑ ho).
arabic: وَلِلَّهِۤ يَسۡجُدُۤ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِن دَآبَّةٖ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walillahi yasjudu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi min dābbatin wal-malāikatu wahum lā yastakbirūna
